About me

A tale

I'm currently working in IT and operations for a leading IT Recruitment company. Now I'm exploring my passion of creating and developing websites. love all things Tech! passionate about coding! I'm proficient at Frontend development; HTML, CSS and Javascript check out my CV HERE.
